body: Least delusional and degenerate ntr artist. Can't write a good plot for shit lmao

Well look no further! Check the link!

Katsura: jokes on you, im into this shjt!

@Warped Fragment Scout You are correct that the author can maintain the expectations of the reader. Even I expected a better ending to this story, since the author announced the realization of more chapters after the first two or three were published. But my criticism goes simply to how this story ended: wasting pages in prologues that only impoverish the characters and plot. Had I known all this beforehand, I would have preferred Dramus to stay in Chapter 1 (and at most Chapter 2).

To SchrodingerZ: Nah, some hentai dumb plots can still mold or expand into further story concepts. Some of these porno/doujin plots can still be written into engaging storylines that are just beyond masturbating to it.

I meet girls / boys who when they found out that the special boy / girl was reciprocating their feelings, they left their sexual friend to try something serious with that special girl / boy. They didn't settle like idiots saying they don't deserve such an opportunity (like Akina, the FMC). LOL. Anyway, we are not here to criticize the unreality of this story.

A story that was wasted when Dramus tried to justify it. The first chapter complies with proving that someone undecided can <lose> the girl. That part is good. But as of the second chapter, this story is going to shit. The reason: Dramus maintains that she is still interested in the MC and the prologues only intensify those feelings. In the end we have a FMC that uses the Bull as a way to escape what it feels. Personally, the FMC is too unreal at times, coming to radically change her personality (from being a girl with a tsundere / energetic character to a girl with poor self-esteem).

The story is fine until Dramus ruined her story with the prologues showing how the Fuckboy conquers her. Instead of developing the FMC, it makes her look stupider. Dramus practically shows that the relationship between the Fuckboy and Akina is nothing more than a form of escapism on her part (Akina). Therefore, it´s somewhat stupid to me that things will end with Akina being <victorious> when the real consequence will be that such a relationship will fails. For this reason, history seems very biased to me.
